trans-unit.source: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests.
trans-unit.target: 用于编码和解码 Url，在处理 Web 请求时提供的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.

The HttpUtility class is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class, whose methods and properties are exposed through the intrinsic ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 内部使用 HttpUtility 类<xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>类，其方法和属性公开通过内部 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>对象。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the HttpUtility class contains encoding and decoding utility methods that are not accessible from the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，HttpUtility 类包含编码和解码不能从<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Server%2A>访问的实用工具方法

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行编码或解码的 web 应用程序之外的值，使用<xref:System.Net.WebUtility>类。</xref:System.Net.WebUtility>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpUtility"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.HttpUtility"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility> class exposes methods for encoding and decoding string based URLs, URL tokens, and paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility>类公开的方法进行编码和解码字符串基于 Url，URL 令牌和路径。</xref:System.Web.HttpUtility>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility> is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class.
Minimally converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 按最小方式将字符串转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The HtmlAttributeEncode method encodes characters appropriate for insertion into an HTML attribute value.
trans-unit.target: HtmlAttributeEncode 方法将适用于插入到 HTML 属性值的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: The string result from the HtmlAttributeEncode method should be used only for double-quoted attributes.
trans-unit.target: 字符串结果从 HtmlAttributeEncode 方法应仅用于双引号括起来的属性。

trans-unit.source: Security issues might arise when using the HtmlAttributeEncode method with single-quoted attributes.
trans-unit.target: 当使用不带单引号属性 HtmlAttributeEncode 方法时，可能会出现安全问题。

trans-unit.source: The string to encode.
An encoded string.
Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string and sends the encoded string to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 按最小方式将字符串转换为 HTML 编码的字符串并将发送到编码的字符串<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>输出流。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The HtmlAttributeEncode method converts only quotation marks ("), ampersands (&), and left angle brackets (<) to equivalent character entities.
trans-unit.target: HtmlAttributeEncode 方法将转换仅引号 （"）、 & 号 （&） 和左的角度方括号 （<) to equivalent character entities. to="" equivalent="" character=""></) to equivalent character entities.>

trans-unit.source: It is considerably faster than the <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode%2A> method.
The string result from the HtmlAttributeEncode method should be used only for double-quoted attributes.
trans-unit.target: 字符串结果从 HtmlAttributeEncode 方法应仅用于双引号括起来的属性。

trans-unit.source: Security issues might arise when using the HtmlAttributeEncode method with single-quoted attributes.
trans-unit.target: 当使用不带单引号属性 HtmlAttributeEncode 方法时，可能会出现安全问题。

trans-unit.source: The string to encode
A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> output stream.
Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.
trans-unit.target: 将已经过 HTML 编码为解码的字符串的 HTTP 传输的字符串转换。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode.
A decoded string.
Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded into a decoded string, and sends the decoded string to a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将已经过 HTML 编码为解码的字符串，并将发送到已解码的字符串的字符串转换<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>输出流。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The string to decode.
A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> stream of output.
Converts an object's string representation into an HTML-encoded string, and returns the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 将对象的字符串表示形式转换为 HTML 编码的字符串，并返回已编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To encode or decode values outside of a web application, use the <xref:System.Net.WebUtility> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要进行编码或解码的 web 应用程序之外的值，使用<xref:System.Net.WebUtility>类。</xref:System.Net.WebUtility>

trans-unit.source: An object.
An encoded string.
Converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string to encode.
An encoded string.
Converts a string into an HTML-encoded string, and returns the output as a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> stream of output.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串转换为 HTML 编码的字符串，并返回形式的输出<xref:System.IO.TextWriter>输出流。</xref:System.IO.TextWriter>

trans-unit.source: The string to encode
A <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> output stream.
Encodes a string.
A string to encode.
An encoded string.
Encodes a string.
A string to encode.
A value that indicates whether double quotation marks will be included around the encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示两个双引号是否将括住已编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An encoded string.
Parses a query string into a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> using <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8*> encoding.
trans-unit.target: 将查询字符串分析成<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8*>编码。</xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8*>

trans-unit.source: The ParseQueryString method uses <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> format to parse the query string In the returned <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>, URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value.
trans-unit.target: ParseQueryString 方法使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>要分析的查询字符串中返回格式<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>、 解码 URL 编码字符和多个出现的相同的查询字符串参数列出作为单个条目使用逗号分隔每个值。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The ParseQueryString method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> ParseQueryString 方法使用查询字符串可能包含用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本利用概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to parse.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> of query parameters and values.
query is .
Parses a query string into a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> using the specified <xref:System.Text.Encoding>.
trans-unit.target: 将查询字符串分析成<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>使用指定的<xref:System.Text.Encoding>.</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: In the returned <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>, URL-encoded characters are decoded and multiple occurrences of the same query string parameter are listed as a single entry with a comma separating each value.
trans-unit.target: 在返回<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>、 解码 URL 编码字符和多个出现的相同的查询字符串参数列出作为单个条目使用逗号分隔每个值。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The ParseQueryString method uses query strings that might contain user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> ParseQueryString 方法使用查询字符串可能包含用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本利用概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to parse.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> to use.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> of query parameters and values.
Converts a string that has been encoded for transmission in a URL into a decoded string.
trans-unit.target: 将已编码用于 URL 传输为解码的字符串的字符串转换。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode.
A decoded string.
Converts a URL-encoded byte array into a decoded string using the specified decoding object.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 编码的字节数组转换为解码的字符串，使用指定的解码对象。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to decode.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> that specifies the decoding scheme.
A decoded string.
Converts a URL-encoded string into a decoded string, using the specified encoding object.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 编码的字符串转换为解码的字符串，使用指定的编码对象。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> that specifies the decoding scheme.
A decoded string.
Converts a URL-encoded byte array into a decoded string using the specified encoding object, starting at the specified position in the array, and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 编码的字节数组转换为解码的字符串，使用指定的编码对象，该数组中指定位置开始并一直到指定的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to decode.
The position in the byte to begin decoding.
trans-unit.target: 要开始解码的字节中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to decode.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object that specifies the decoding scheme.
A decoded string.
bytes is , but count does not equal .
trans-unit.target: bytesis , but count does not equal .

trans-unit.source: Converts a URL-encoded array of bytes into a decoded array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将为 URL 编码的字节数组转换为一个已解码的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to decode.
A decoded array of bytes.
Converts a URL-encoded string into a decoded array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将一个已解码的字节数组转换为 URL 编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode.
A decoded array of bytes.
Converts a URL-encoded string into a decoded array of bytes using the specified decoding object.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 编码的字符串转换为一个已解码的字节使用指定的解码对象数组。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object that specifies the decoding scheme.
A decoded array of bytes.
Converts a URL-encoded array of bytes into a decoded array of bytes, starting at the specified position in the array and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将为 URL 编码的字节数组转换为一个已解码的字节，从数组中指定位置开始，直到指定数目的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to decode.
The position in the byte array at which to begin decoding.
trans-unit.target: 从此处开始解码的字节数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to decode.
A decoded array of bytes.
bytes is , but count does not equal .
trans-unit.target: bytesis , but count does not equal .

trans-unit.source: Converts a byte array into an encoded URL string.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组转换为已编码的 URL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to encode.
An encoded string.
Encodes a URL string.
The text to encode.
An encoded string.
Encodes a URL string using the specified encoding object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的编码对象 URL 字符串进行编码。

trans-unit.source: The text to encode.
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> object that specifies the encoding scheme.
An encoded string.
Converts a byte array into a URL-encoded string, starting at the specified position in the array and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组转换为 URL 编码字符串中，从数组中指定位置开始并一直到指定的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to encode.
The position in the byte array at which to begin encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从此处开始编码的字节数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to encode.
An encoded string.
Converts an array of bytes into a URL-encoded array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组转换为 URL 编码的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to encode.
An encoded array of bytes.
Converts a string into a URL-encoded array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串转换为 URL 编码的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The string to encode.
An encoded array of bytes.
Converts a string into a URL-encoded array of bytes using the specified encoding object.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串转换为 URL 编码的使用指定的编码对象的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The string to encode
The <xref:System.Text.Encoding> that specifies the encoding scheme.
An encoded array of bytes.
Converts an array of bytes into a URL-encoded array of bytes, starting at the specified position in the array and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组转换为 URL 编码的字节，从数组中指定位置开始，直到指定数目的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The array of bytes to encode.
The position in the byte array at which to begin encoding.
trans-unit.target: 从此处开始编码的字节数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to encode.
An encoded array of bytes.
bytes is , but count does not equal .
trans-unit.target: bytesis , but count does not equal .

trans-unit.source: Converts a string into a Unicode string.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串转换为 Unicode 字符串。

trans-unit.source: If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 HTTP 流传递字符如空格和标点符号，它们可能被错误解释在接收端。

trans-unit.source: URL encoding converts characters that are not valid in a URL to character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding.
trans-unit.target: URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; URL 中无效的字符URL 解码反转的编码。

trans-unit.source: For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当在要传输在 URL 中，字符的文本块中嵌入\<和&1;> 被编码为 %3 c 和 %3e。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
A Unicode string in %UnicodeValue notation.
trans-unit.target: %中的 Unicode 字符串UnicodeValue 表示法。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Unicode string into an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将 Unicode 字符串转换为字节数组。

trans-unit.source: If characters such as blanks and punctuation are passed in an HTTP stream, they might be misinterpreted at the receiving end.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 HTTP 流传递字符如空格和标点符号，它们可能被错误解释在接收端。

trans-unit.source: URL encoding converts characters that are not valid in a URL to character-entity equivalents; URL decoding reverses the encoding.
trans-unit.target: URL 编码将转换为字符实体等效项; URL 中无效的字符URL 解码反转的编码。

trans-unit.source: For example, when embedded in a block of text to be transmitted in a URL, the characters \< and > are encoded as %3c and %3e.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当在要传输在 URL 中，字符的文本块中嵌入\<和&1;> 被编码为 %3 c 和 %3e。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert.
A byte array.
Do not use; intended only for browser compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用;仅供浏览器兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlEncode*>.
The text to encode.
The encoded text.
